job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Mechanical or Industrial Engineering
job.description: at path we work to develop stateoftheart artificial intelligence machine learning computer vision and sensors systems to make industrial robots intelligent we create world transforming technology like our first robotic welding system allowing hardware to do much more with much less human inputltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for a machine learning engineer who is eager to find novel solutions and methods to solve challenging problems you will report to the engineering manager of aicvml and will join a team of dedicated supportive and enthusiastic people to help create new machine learning algorithms to improve rate of learning generalizability variable reduction increase runtimes or improve applicability to different modalities of dataltligtltligtrun machine learning test and experiments and perform statistical analysis ltligtltligtcollaborate with software and hardware teams to build data and model pipelines ltligtltligtstay uptodate with new research and novel findings in machine learning ltbrgtltligtltulgtwho you areltbrgtltulgtltligtyou have years of experience working with machine learning algorithmsltligtltligtyou have an advanced degree in in or caffe and gpubased computation in generalltligtltligtyou have proficiency in python or ccltligtltligtyou have experience with common image or vision processing libraries opencv or do and enjoy working in a collaborative environmentltligtltligtyou like the idea of working at a tech first company with all the perks that go with that free lunch unlimited time off team events and great benefitsltbrgtltligtltulgtat path robotics we love coming to work to solve interesting and tough challenges but also because our ideas are welcomed and valued we encourage unique thinking and
